Class PeerNode

java.lang.Object
org.derekn.p2pSim.NetworkNode
org.derekn.p2pSim.PeerNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
Leecher, Seeder, Supernode
public abstract class PeerNode extends NetworkNode
Abstract class representing a peer node in the network. Each peer can own file chunks and participate in data transfers. Handles logic for chunk management and active transfer tracking.

  • Constructor Details

    • PeerNode

      public PeerNode(int id, double x, double y, int totalChunks)
      Constructs a new PeerNode instance with specified properties. Random upload and download speeds simulate heterogeneous peers.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the peer
      x - X-coordinate of the peer
      y - Y-coordinate of the peer
      totalChunks - Total number of file chunks to be downloaded

  • Method Details

    • hasChunk

      public boolean hasChunk(int chunkIndex)
      Checks if the peer already owns a specific chunk.
      Parameters:
      chunkIndex - Index of the chunk
      Returns:
      true if the chunk is present; false otherwise

    • hasCompleteFile

      public boolean hasCompleteFile()
      Determines whether the peer has completed downloading all file chunks.
      Returns:
      true if all chunks are owned; false otherwise

    • receiveChunk

      public void receiveChunk(int chunkIndex)
      Adds a chunk to the list of owned chunks.
      Parameters:
      chunkIndex - Index of the chunk to add

    • getOwnedChunks

      public Set<Integer> getOwnedChunks()
      Retrieves the set of chunks this peer owns.
      Returns:
      Set of chunk indices

    • getMissingChunks

      public Set<Integer> getMissingChunks()
      Identifies all file chunks that this peer still needs.
      Returns:
      Set of missing chunk indices

    • getUploadSpeed

      public double getUploadSpeed()
      Gets the upload speed of the peer.
      Returns:
      Upload speed in KB/s

    • getDownloadSpeed

      public double getDownloadSpeed()
      Gets the download speed of the peer.
      Returns:
      Download speed in KB/s

    • getActiveTransfers

      public List<Transfer> getActiveTransfers()
      Returns a list of current active transfers involving this peer.
      Returns:
      List of active transfers

    • addTransfer

      public void addTransfer(Transfer t)
      Adds a transfer to this peer's active transfer list.
      Parameters:
      t - Transfer to track

    • clearTransfers

      public void clearTransfers()
      Clears all active transfer records from this peer. Called at the end of a simulation tick.

    • getNodeType

      public abstract String getNodeType()
      Description copied from class: NetworkNode
      Return a string representing the type of node. Used for distinguishing node roles (e.g., seed, peer).
      Specified by:
      getNodeType in class NetworkNode
      Returns:
      Node type as a string
